name: Snek (plankp)
description:
Snek! Not gonna lie, this was meant for an earlier monthly themed "Vintage", but I just realized I never submitted this project... Whoops~ What is this?

It's a modification of the original snake game. Notably:

  • You can wrap around the edges (instead of game over)
  • The game may hang once the snake is long enough
How to start?
  • Hit one of the arrow keys to start
  • Hit enter at any point to restart the game

Code is on GitHub in plankp/Snek
